segments.text: I am genuinely amazed by the woman's complete unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with such intense focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the constant gush of water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing right in front of her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle is soaking her dress and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are behind her, almost certainly getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s frustrating to watch someone miss so many obvious cues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her serene expression is almost maddening under the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout, "Look down! Look around!"
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment seems almost impossible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be incredibly preoccupied with something else entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential consequences of her inattention are substantial.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of this trance.
segments.speaker: PAR
